title.value: The Secret to Better AI and Better Software (is Requirements Engineering)
title.justification: The title explicitly mentioned in the document.
title.quote: The Secret to Better AI and Better Software (is Requirements Engineering)

extractions.description: This paper discusses the role of requirements engineering in improving AI and software, suggesting that integrating human intelligence with AI can greatly enhance software development. Various AI tools are proposed to aid different stages of requirements engineering.

type.justification: The paper discusses practical applications and examples of how AI can be integrated with requirements engineering, focusing on empirical evidence from different case studies and AI tools.
type.quote: As shown in Table 1 and Table 2, there are many ways AI can help RE, across a broad range of SE activities.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the integration of AI within software engineering processes, especially requirements engineering.
name.quote: Much has been written about the algorithmic role that AI plays for automation in SE.

name.justification: The paper focuses on how requirements engineering can be used to improve AI and software development.
name.quote: Can we make better software by combining human and artificial intelligence? Researchers in requirements engineering think so.

name.justification: Discusses the application of AI techniques and tools for improving various aspects of software engineering.
name.quote: AI for RE across the life-cycle. Just to say the obvious, the above is just a small sample of where AI is being applied to RE.
